screenshots.caption: RLM Log Reader on Linux CentOS 5
RLM Log Reader on Mac OS X 10.7

name: RLM Log Reader
short_description: This utility reads usage log files from Reprise License Manager (RLM) and produces reports that can be more easily read by a human and analyzed in spreadsheet software. RLM is a third-party license manager for Independent Software Vendors (ISVs) to enforce license policies with their products. RLM Log Reader is not affiliated in any way with Reprise License Manager or Reprise Software. For more information on their products, visit their website: http://www.reprisesoftware.com.
summary: Read usage log files from Reprise License Manager
